title: Unlocking the Power of Apache Cassandra® 5.0: Innovations & a Sneak Peek at 5.1
description:
Join us for an in-depth webinar where we explore the exciting new features of Apache Cassandra® 5.0 and what to look forward to in Cassandra 5.1. This release brings significant advancements in database technology, including Storage Attached Indexes (SAI), Vector Search, Trie-Indexed Memtables, and Transactional Cluster Metadata.

Our expert, Mick Semb Wever and webinar host Sami Kaksonen, will guide you through these innovations and demonstrate how they can enhance your data management strategies. Additionally, we will provide a sneak peek into the upcoming Cassandra 5.1 features. Don't miss this opportunity to stay ahead of the curve with the latest in Cassandra technology.

Webinar Agenda:
Introduction to Apache Cassandra® 5.0
Storage Attached Indexes - CEP 7
Vector Search - CEP 30
Trie-Indexed Memtables - CEP 19
Transactional Cluster Metadata - CEP 21
Overview of Other New Features
Sneak Peek into Cassandra 5.1
ACID Transactions - CEP 15
Ask us anything!

SESSION RESOURCES:
Free Cassandra Health Check: https://dtsx.io/3UAef0x
Forrest Report: https://dtsx.io/4fpFBhT
ACID-CEP: https://dtsx.io/3YHNUQx
Zero Downtime Migration: https://bit.ly/4hqF80L  
Luna: https://bit.ly/4hqJXXV 

Additional Resources:
- DataStax Developer Hub: https://datastax.com/devs
- DataStax Blog: https://www.datastax.com/blog/technical-how-tos
- Langflow: https://langflow.datastax.com
- Astra DB: https://astra.datastax.com
____________________

Stay in touch:
- Join our Discord Community: https://discord.gg/datastax
- Follow us on X: https://x.com/DataStaxDevs
